articles.title: Kim Jong Un Visits Construction Sites in Wonsan City
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Visits Construction Sites in Wonsan City
 Pyongyang, February 11 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, provided field guidance to the construction sites of baby Home, orphanage and orphans' primary and secondary schools in Wonsan City.
					 Going round the construction sites, he learned in detail about the construction.
					
					 Noting that the baby home, orphanage and orphans' primary and secondary schools are being built along one line and construction of nursing and educational establishments for orphans this way will help them finish the whole course from nursery to secondary school without any inconvenience.
					
					  It is an unshakable resolution of our party to bring up all the orphans as excellent pillars of the country, he said, giving an instruction to push forward the constriction projects.
					
					 He gave an instruction to dynamically conduct frontline-style political work including visual and broadcasting agitations and art squad activities and energetically wage a socialist emulation among units, at different stages and among construction projects so as to bring about great innovations and leap forward.
					
					 Underscoring the need to pay deep attention to ensuring the quality of structure, he said it is necessary to strengthen supervision and control so that builders may thoroughly meet the requirements of designs and construction methods.
					
					 Noting that it is possible to step up construction projects only when building materials including structural steel and cement are satisfactorily supplied, he took measures for them.
					
					 Underlining the need to arrange well the environment of the baby home, orphanage and orphans' primary and secondary schools, he called for planting lots of trees in the mountain and field near them so that they may be thick with foliage.
					
					 He said that the construction and preparations for operation should be pushed forward simultaneously, underscoring the need to produce furniture, household utensils and other school things required for the operation of the baby home, orphanage and orphans' primary and secondary schools and step up, at the same time, the work for making uniforms for nurses and kindergarten teachers at the best level and the work for selecting management members and preparing them.
					
					  Recalling that the party sent a standard design for nursing and educational establishments for orphans to every province, he stressed that the relevant areas should wage a dynamic drive for building baby homes, orphanages, orphan's primary and secondary schools to suit the features of their areas, give prominence to their appearance and to be in line with their environment and accommodating capacity.
					
					 He called upon every province to build up the forces for designing and construction and lay solid material and technical foundations in order to thoroughly implement the party's construction policy.
					
					 Going round the construction site, I feel once again that the party's plan is being successfully translated into reality wherever service personnel work, he noted. 
					
					 He highly praised service personnel of KPA Navy Unit 863 for having wound up the frame project of the baby home though they had no experience in construction. They could do this because they had waged a devoted struggle as the standard-bearer and a model in implementing the ideas of the party and upholding its policies, under the slogan "Let the People's Army take charge of both national defence and socialist construction!", he said. 
					
					 It is a great pity for failing to meet soldiers of the unit as they are on training to carry out a fresh order, he said. He asked officials to tell them that the supreme commander was very pleased to look round their construction site and convey his militant salute to them without fail.
					
					 He instructed the People's Army to get more forces involved in the construction so as to complete the construction of the baby home and orphanage in Wonsan City till the Day of the Sun and construction of the orphan's primary and secondary schools till the day of war victory this year marking the 70th founding anniversary of the WPK.     He called on the People's Army to ensure the best quality in construction so that they may take responsibility for the safety of the projects and guarantee their absolute quality for all eternity and thus provide good cradle to the orphans.
					
					 He expressed belief and conviction that the soldier-builders would complete the construction of the baby home, orphanage and orphan's primary and secondary schools in Wonsan City by joining efforts with people in Kangwon Province and thus uphold in practice the intention of the party to bring up the orphans as reliable heirs to the revolution.
					
					 He was accompanied by Choe Ryong Hae, Hwang Pyong So, Hyon Yong Chol, Han Kwang Sang and Jo Yong Won.

articles.title: S. Korean Authorities' Toeing U.S. Policy Will Lead to Miserable End: CPRK Special Statement
articles.content:
S. Korean Authorities' Policy of Toeing U.S. Policy Will Lead to Miserable End: CPRK Special Statement
 Pyongyang, February 11 (KCNA) -- The Committee for the Peaceful Reunification of Korea (CPRK) released a special statement on Wednesday clarifying the stand of the DPRK in connection with the grave situation prevailing on the Korean peninsula due to the south Korean authorities' anachronistic policy of toeing the U.S. line.
					 The statement said:
					
					1. The south Korean authorities will not be able to escape the most miserable end if they persistently join the U.S. moves for a war of aggression aimed to disturb peace and stability on the Korean peninsula and stifle the DPRK.
					
					 The DPRK has so far advanced the most reasonable and realistic proposals for the peaceful reunification and made consistent efforts for their materialization. It was not because it did not know other means and ways of achieving reunification nor it lacked muscle and ability to do so.
					
					 We do not want the Korean peninsula to suffer another war disaster. We have bolstered up the military capacity in every way despite stern test of history. It was aimed to avert the U.S. war of aggression and protect the destiny of the nation. The DPRK's access to smaller, precision and diversified nuclear strike means was designed to conclude the final battle with the U.S. in its mainland.
					
					 But we do not hide that if the south Korean warmongers offer cannon fodder for U.S. war of aggression against the DPRK, south Korea will also be the target of our retaliatory strikes.
					
					 Aggressors and provokers are bound to die and we are sure to survive. This is our faith and the philosophy of sure victory.
					
					2. If the south Korean authorities persistently pursue international "cooperation" aimed to put pressure on the DPRK and bring it down, they will not escape the most shameful destruction. Those who want to add to their crimes, acting a shock brigade in the U.S. "international cooperation" in utter disregard of national dignity and interests will never be able to escape unheard-of toughest counteraction declared by the DPRK. 
					
					3. The south Korean authorities will face stern trial by the nation as the most hideous confrontational maniacs if they work hard to turn the north-south relations into scapegoat of U.S.-south Korea master-servant relationship under the deceptive signboard of "dialogue".
					
					We made a bold decision to treat the south Korean ruling quarters as a dialogue partner and settle north-south relations with them even though they were steeped in sycophancy and submission to the U.S.  to the marrow of their bones. This was to create an opportunity of doing good things for the nation on such an important occasion as this year.
					
					 The south Korean authorities should not talk about "change in attitude" of others but opt for fundamentally settling the north-south relations from a proper attitude toward the fellow countrymen, though belatedly.
					
					 The south Korean authorities should clearly understand that their submission to the U.S. would bring them only the most miserable end.
					
					 All the Koreans in the north and the south and abroad should turn out in the sacred and patriotic struggle to resolutely foil the U.S. moves to stem the gigantic trend toward Korea's reunification and frustrate the south Korean puppet forces' acts of treachery, and usher in a new era of peace, stability, independent reunification and prosperity on the Korean peninsula.

articles.title: Congratulatory Message to Tunisian Prime Minister
articles.content:
Congratulatory Message to Tunisian Prime Minister
 Pyongyang, February 11 (KCNA) -- Pak Pong Ju, prime minister of the DPRK, Tuesday sent a congratulatory message to Habib Essid upon his appointment as prime minister of the Republic of Tunisia.
					 The message wished him success in his work for the political stability of the country and its economic prosperity.
					
					 DPRK Foreign Minister Ri Su Yong sent a congratulatory message to Taieb Baccouche upon his appointment as foreign minister of Tunisia on the same day.

articles.title: Reception Given by Iranian Ambassador
articles.content:
Reception Given by Iranian Ambassador
 Pyongyang, February 11 (KCNA) -- Mansour Chavoshi, Iranian ambassador to the DPRK, gave a reception at the Taedonggang Diplomatic Club on Wednesday on the occasion of the 36th anniversary of the victory of the Islamic Revolution of Iran.
					 Present there on invitation were Foreign Minister Ri Su Yong, Minister of Labor Jong Yong Su who is chairman of the DPRK-Iran Friendship Association and other officials concerned, diplomatic envoys and representatives of international bodies here.
					
					 The ambassador said in a speech that the all-people revolution won the victory to establish new political system against the monarchy in Iran in 1979.
					
					 He referred to the foreign policy of Iran improving relations with its neighboring countries and intensifying many-sided exchange with them.
					
					 The visit to Iran by the DPRK's foreign minister and his party last year marked an important occasion in boosting the bilateral relations, he noted.
					
					 He said that the friendly relations between Iran and the DPRK will grow stronger under the special care of HE Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Ri Su Yong said that over the past 36 years since the victory of the revolution the Iranian people have made persistent efforts to achieve the development and prosperity of the nation while repulsing all challenges and intervention by the hostile forces.
					
					 He noted he was rejoiced over many achievements made by Iran in ensuring regional peace and security under the leadership of HE Seyed Ali Khamenei, leader of the Islamic Revolution of Iran, and President HE Hassan Rouhani.
					
					 He expressed belief that cooperation between the two countries and joint action would grow stronger in the efforts to reject the high-handed and arbitrary practices of the hostile forces and defend the sovereignty and dignity of the country.

articles.title: WPK's Struggle Supported by Algerian Political Party Leader
articles.content:
WPK's Struggle Supported by Algerian Political Party Leader
 Pyongyang, February 11 (KCNA) -- Choe Hyok Chol, DPRK ambassador to Algeria, paid a courtesy call on Ammar Saadani, general secretary of the Algerian National Liberation Front Party, on Feb. 2.
					 At the meeting the general secretary said:
					
					 The leadership and members of the Algerian National Liberation Front Party are fascinated by respected HE Kim Jong Un and fully supporting whatever planned by him.
					
					 HE Kim Jong Un is leading the Korean people, holding arms and pursuing the line of building a thriving nation.
					
					 He made a bold decision to prevent a war on the Korean peninsula and achieve the peaceful reunification of Korea.
					
					 The Algerian National Liberation Front Party will as ever extend full support and solidarity to the Workers' Party of Korea in its struggle for rejecting the U.S. interference, defending socialism and reunifying the country.
					
					 The relations between the two countries are deep-rooted and historical relations of friendship and cooperation provided by President Houari Boumedienne and Kim Il Sung, President of the Korean people.
					
					 We will make positive efforts to boost the traditional and historical friendship and cooperation, solidarity and unity with the Workers' Party of Korea in the future, too.

articles.title: Statement of DPRK NDC Distributed as UNSC Official Document
articles.content:
Statement of DPRK NDC Distributed as UNSC Official Document
 Pyongyang, February 11 (KCNA) -- The statement of the DPRK National Defence Commission (NDC) "The gangster-like U.S. imperialists, engrossed in the hostile policy toward the DPRK, will surely meet the most disastrous, final doom" was distributed as an official document S/2015/90 of the UN Security Council on February 9.

articles.title: Friendship Meeting with Staff Members of Mongolian Embassy Held
articles.content:
Friendship Meeting with Staff Members of Mongolian Embassy Held
 Pyongyang, February 11 (KCNA) -- A friendship meeting with staff members of the Mongolian embassy here took place at Changdok School here on Wednesday on the occasions of the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il and the Lunar New Year's Day (Feb. 19).
					 Present there were Vice-Chairman Pak Kyong Il and members of the DPRK-Mongolia Friendship Association and Lombo Khash-Erdene, charge d'affaires ad interim of the Mongolian embassy here, and his embassy officials.
					
					 The participants laid bouquets before the statue of President Kim Il Sung at the school and paid tribute to him.
					
					 They played volleyball, basketball and other sports games.
					
					 At the end of the games, they talked with each other about boosting the cooperation between the two countries.

articles.title: National Cooking Competition Held
articles.content:
National Cooking Competition Held
 Pyongyang, February 11 (KCNA) -- A national cooking competition took place at the Pyongyang Noodle House on Tuesday and Wednesday with the approach of the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il. 
					 The competition was divided into the 5 panels of the General Bureau of Public Service, public catering establishments in Pyongyang and every province, external service and service of ministries and national institutions. 
					
					 The competition was divided into designated dishes including sinsollo, seafood casserole and corn breads and meat, fish and mushroom dishes and drinks prepared by the participating units in specified time and an exhibition of potato and maize based-food. 
					
					 Designated dishes prepared by cooks from Okryu Restaurant and Chongryu Restaurant clearly showed the specific features of Korean dishes full of national flavor.
					
					 Attracting the attention of the participants were varieties of dishes presented by Chongchun Restaurant, Ryonmot Restaurant and other catering establishments.
					
					 Dishes prepared by different restaurants were highly appreciated by participants for advantages and unique tastes of dishes.

articles.title: Hasong Tire Factory Increases Production
articles.content:
Hasong Tire Factory Increases Production
 Pyongyang, February 11 (KCNA) -- The Hasong Tire Factory in the DPRK has increased tire production by modernizing its production processes.
					 The factory are producing tires for 42-ton and 55-ton lorries, etc.
					
					 In this regard, O Phil Su, manager of the factory, told KCNA:
					
					 We have updated the production processes by our own efforts. When starting the modernization, it was planned to import some equipments from foreign countries, but imperialists' sanctions against the DPRK made it impossible. So, we were determined to modernize the production processes of the factory by our own efforts.
					
					 The new production processes make it possible to develop new kinds of tires with their serviceable life 2 times longer than imports, while lessening curing-time by two hours.
					
					 As a result, the productivity of the factory has been increased over seven times.

articles.title: DPRK Citizens Enraged at S. Korean Media Report
articles.content:
DPRK Citizens Enraged at S. Korean Media Report
 Pyongyang, February 11 (KCNA) -- People in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea have been enraged at a recent report by south Korea's Channel A Broadcasting Service that defended a germ warfare committed by the U.S. in the 1950-1953 Korean War.
					 Ri Yong Hwan, a researcher of the History Institute under the Academy of Social Sciences, told KCNA in this regard:
					
					 The Channel A reported the DPRK is spreading a "fiction" that the U.S. used germ weapons in the war and has deployed chemical weapons in Okinawa.
					
					 It was a well-known fact that in the Korean War the U.S. used germ weapons and poison gas and other toxic chemical weapons in flagrant violation of international laws.
					
					 The fact was verified by different international fact-finding teams, including the one from the International Association of Democratic Lawyers, and the testimonies of American pilots captured while dropping germ bombs. 
					
					 It was also evidenced by a document showing that the U.S. Joint Chiefs of Staff ordered on carrying on germ weapon experiments in the northern half of Korea during the war and by a recently-disclosed report on the germ warfare worked out by a British biochemist in 1952. The biochemist's report disclosed that the U.S. learnt from Japan how to develop and use germ weapons in order to apply them in the war.
					
					 Nevertheless, the south Korean puppet group is attempting to shield such deadly crimes, committed by the U.S. imperialist murderers against the nation, in a bid to prolong its remaining days. Such behavior deserves curses and punishment by all Koreans.
					
					 Han Hyong Chol, section chief of the Taedonggang Beer Factory, said it is high treason for the puppet group to try to cover up the U.S. war crimes, which can never be pardoned.

articles.title: Research into Insam Intensified in DPRK
articles.content:
Research into Insam Intensified in DPRK
 Pyongyang, February 11 (KCNA) -- Kaesong Koryo Insam (ginseng) of Korea is well known to the world as a tonic.
					 It has been recently confirmed that hair root of insam, too, is of high medical effect.
					
					 In this regard, Ri Song Suk, section chief of the DPRK Academy of Koryo Medicine, told KCNA:
					
					 The hair root of insam means fibril after the process of insam. The research results showed that the fibril contains much more saponin, a main active component of insam, than its body root.
					
					 Steamed insam has more than 9 kinds of saponin in its main, lateral and hair roots, and this content is higher in hair root than main root.
					
					 Dried insam contains 2.1 percent saponin in main root and 9.25 percent in hair root.
					
					 We are now intensifying the research into the process of insam hair root to preserve its medical effect.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Accuses S. Korean Authorities of Their Sycophancy toward U.S.
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Accuses S. Korean Authorities of Their Sycophancy toward U.S.
 Pyongyang, February 11 (KCNA) -- The inter-Korean relations again remain tense and dialogue failed to take place entirely because of the U.S. harsh hostile policy toward the DPRK and the south Korean authorities' treacherous act of toeing the U.S. line.
					 Rodong Sinmun Wednesday says this in an article.
					
					 Disclosing the U.S. moves to stifle the DPRK which have reached an extreme pitch, the article notes this is a deliberate artifice to chill the atmosphere for improving the inter-Korean relations and zealously egg the south Korean authorities on to confrontation with the fellow countrymen in the north.
					
					 Blasting the south Korean authorities for more desperately escalating the confrontation with the DPRK in collusion with their master, persistently sticking to their bad habit of toeing foreign forces' line, the article goes on:
					
					 How can dialogue open between the north and the south and trust and unity be promoted under the situation in which the U.S. and south Korea are conspiring with each other in provocations against the DPRK while going against the broad-minded proposal of the DPRK for peace and stability on the Korean peninsula.
					
					 The reality goes to prove once again that the south Korean authorities' dependence on foreign forces is a stumbling block lying in the way of improving the inter-Korean relations and national reunification.
					
					 The south Korean authorities should not pay lip service to "dialogue" and "improved relations" and shift the blame for the failure to open dialogue onto others but create conditions and climate for opening dialogue in practice. 
					
					 What is essential is to settle the national issue, reunification issue from an independent stand free from the U.S. control.

articles.title: U.S. and S. Korean Authorities' Anti-DPRK Propaganda Blasted
articles.content:
U.S. and S. Korean Authorities' Anti-DPRK Propaganda Blasted
 Pyongyang, February 11 (KCNA) -- These days the U.S. and south Korean authorities are speaking volumes about "instability of social system" and "collapse" in the DPRK. 
					 Rodong Sinmun Wednesday says in a commentary in this regard: 
					
					 This is ridiculous behavior of the bat-blind unable to face up to the present reality.
					
					 The south Korean puppet authorities show disgusting behavior of currying favor with the rabid dog U.S. barking at the moon. What matters is that this will adversely affect the north-south relations. It is self-evident that this will bring nothing but a catastrophe and conflict to the north-south relations.
					
					 The south Korean authorities must be aware of this. Gravity of the situation is that the south Korean authorities are keen on the anti-DPRK propaganda in collusion with the U.S. though they know very well that it would be little short of sparking the inter-Korean confrontation. 
					
					 The U.S. and the south Korean authorities would be sadly mistaken if they calculate that they can do harm to the DPRK through such poor false propaganda and check the victorious advance of the Songun revolutionary cause. 
					
					 The more desperately they resort to such wicked and clumsy behavior, the more saliently they will reveal their despicable true colors of dreaming a foolish dream of the "collapse of north Korea" which will never come true. 
					
					 The U.S. and south Korean authorities would be well advised to ponder over the catastrophic consequences to be entailed by the reckless remarks and behave themselves.

articles.title: Minju Joson Exposes Attempt of Japan's Chief Executive to Deny Its Past Crimes
articles.content:
Minju Joson Exposes Attempt of Japan's Chief Executive to Deny Its Past Crimes
 Pyongyang, February 11 (KCNA) -- Japan's chief executive is mulling announcing new "statement" replacing "Murayama statement" this year, 70th anniversary of its defeat in the war. He made clear that in the new "statement" he would not follow the keynote expressions of "Murayama statement". Tomiichi Murayama who was prime minister of Japan in August 1995 said in a speech that he admitted Japan took the road of aggression and war by enforcing the wrong state policy in the past, and vowed not to make the past wrongdoings again by seriously reflecting on the lesson of history and informing the rising generations of it.
					 The present chief executive of Japan wants to delete from his new "statement" such core expressions as "colonial rule", "aggression" and "apology" that were contained in "Murayama statement" which admitted and reflected on Japan's past crimes.
					
					 Minju Joson Wednesday in a commentary terms this an undisguised challenge and mockery of not only the Korean nation which suffered bitter pain due to Japan but also those countries that suffered damage and the international community.
					
					 The attempt of Japan's chief executive to deny "Murayama statement" is, in essence, a revelation of his open willingness to make Japan follow in the footsteps of the predecessors who committed crimes in the past.
					
					 With no rhetoric can Japan justify its criminal attempt.

articles.title: Sexual Abuses by University Professors in S. Korea
articles.content:
Sexual Abuses by University Professors in S. Korea 
 Pyongyang, February 11 (KCNA) -- Sexual abuses by university professors broke out in south Korea, sparking off public uproar, according to the south Korean CBS on February 5. 
					 Several professors of Seoul National University habitually committed sexual abuses against girl students. 
					
					 A complaint was brought against a professor at medical postgraduate course on the suspicion of sexual abuse against a girl student. 
					
					 These indecent sexual abuses by university professors who have to give right moral and ethic education to students fully show the reality of the degenerated and fin de siecle society of south Korea riddled with immorality, corruption and crimes.

articles.title: Sit-in Strike of Bereaved Families Supported in S. Korea
articles.content:
Sit-in Strike of Bereaved Families Supported in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, February 11 (KCNA) -- South Korean bereaved families of victims of 501-Oryong ship sinking accident are staging a sit-in strike in demand of steps for putting the accident under control.
					 The angry bereaved families staged a protest sit-in strike outside the head office of the fishing boat company in Sodaemun District, Seoul.
					
					 Their action is fully supported by civic and public organizations. 
					
					 The bereaved families of the ferry Sewol disaster held a press conference on the scene on Feb. 5 together with the bereaved families of 501-Oryong ship disaster.

articles.title: No One Can Block Advance of Korean People: Bulgarian Figure
articles.content:
No One Can Block Advance of Korean People: Bulgarian Figure
 Pyongyang, February 11 (KCNA) -- The U.S. imperialists and their followers can never block the advance of the Korean people building a thriving nation, the lifelong desire of leader Kim Jong Il, united in single mind around Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					 Atanas Ivanov, honorary chairman of the Bulgarian Communists Union, said this at a ceremony of releasing Kim Jong Un's work "Let Us Step Up the Building of a Thriving Country by Applying Kim Jong Il's Patriotism" held at a publishing house in Sofia, Bulgaria on Feb. 5.
					
					 He said that the work reflects the iron will of Kim Jong Un to build a thriving socialist nation on this land without fail, true to the high intention of Kim Jong Il, a peerless patriot.
					
					 The DPRK in which Kim Jong Il's patriotism, the highest purification of patriotism, is fully embodied, is the beacon for us, he noted.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Feats Praised by Nigerian Organization
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Feats Praised by Nigerian Organization 
 Pyongyang, February 11 (KCNA) -- The Nigerian National Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism posted articles on its internet homepage on Jan. 30 and Feb. 2 on the occasion of the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 The homepage in an article titled "The great nationalist" said that the DPRK and the Korean people have caught the attention of the international community as the powerful nation of independence and as the people strong in independent spirit. 
					
					 It went on:
					
					 Kim Jong Il dedicated his all to instilling the spirit of national self-respect into the Korean people.
					
					 He increased the national defence capabilities in every way, averted the outbreak of a war on the Korean peninsula and defended the destiny of all the Koreans under the uplifted banner of Songun against the extreme offensive of the imperialist allied forces against socialism and their moves to stifle the DPRK.  
					
					 Kim Jong Il, who led the country and the people to overcome the worst hardships and trials and fully demonstrate the might of an independent powerful nation, ushered in a new era of building a thriving nation.
					
					 The homepage dealt with immortal feats he performed for the building of a thriving nation and the cause of the country's reunification. It noted that he was the great nationalist as he defended the destiny of the country and the nation and opened up a bright future.
					
					 The homepage in an article titled "Charm" said that the international community hardly repress charm and admiration at him and introduced the comments of prominent foreigners who had the honor of being received by him.
					
					 It also edited an article on his personality as the genuine people's leader.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's New Year Address Supported by Guinean Figure
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's New Year Address Supported by Guinean Figure
 Pyongyang, February 11 (KCNA) -- Banou Keita, chairman of the Guinea-Korea Friendship Association, issued a statement on Feb. 2 in support of the New Year address made by supreme leader Kim Jong Un.
					 He said:
					
					 The Workers' Party of Korea and the Korean people have resolutely foiled the U.S. and its followers' moves to stifle the DPRK and won the great victory last year under the leadership of Kim Jong Un.
					
					 However complicated the situation may be and whatever obstacles and difficulties may stand in our way, we should unfailingly achieve national reunification, a lifetime desire of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il and the greatest desire of the nation, and build a dignified and prosperous reunified nation on this land, Kim Jong Un stressed, indicating the concrete and realistic ways to do so.
					
					 We, aspiring after Korea's independent and peaceful reunification and world peace, warmly support the proposal for Korea's reunification clarified by him and express belief that the Korean people will open up a broad avenue to independent reunification this year.
					
					 We urge the south Korean authorities to stop at once all moves against the DPRK and the U.S. to roll back its anachronistic hostile policy toward the DPRK and discontinue joint military drills escalating the tension on the Korean peninsula.

articles.title: Day of Shining Star to Be Marked in Russia
articles.content:
Day of Shining Star to Be Marked in Russia
 Pyongyang, February 11 (KCNA) -- A preparatory committee for celebrating the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il (the Day of the Shining Star) was formed by the Maritime Territorial Branch of the All-Russia War Veterans' Social Organization "Militant Fraternity" on February 6.
					 Donets, chairman of the branch, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 The preparatory committee decided to organize a seminar, film show and other colorful political and cultural events praising the sacred revolutionary career and immortal feats of Kim Jong Il on the occasion of the Day of the Shining Star.

articles.title: Day of Shining Star to Be Marked in South Africa
articles.content:
Day of Shining Star to Be Marked in South Africa
 Pyongyang, February 11 (KCNA) -- A South African preparatory committee for celebrating the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il (the Day of the Shining Star) was formed with due ceremony in Gauteng Province on February 7.
					 A secretary of the Gauteng Provincial Committee of the Communist Party of South Africa was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 The preparatory committee decided to organize a meeting, seminar, lecture, film show and other colorful political and cultural events praising the sacred revolutionary career and immortal feats of Kim Jong Il on the occasion of the Day of the Shining Star.
					
					 A congratulatory message to Marshal Kim Jong Un was adopted at the inaugural ceremony.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Published in Bulgaria
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Published in Bulgaria
 Pyongyang, February 11 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un's work "Let Us Step Up the Building of a Thriving Country by Applying Kim Jong Il's Patriotism" was printed in booklet by a publishing house of Bulgaria.
					 The work, published on July 26, Juche 101 (2012), clarifies the essence of Kim Jong Il's patriotism and his whole life characterized by his warm love for the country and its people.
					
					 It also clarifies important issues arising in embodying Kim Jong Il's patriotism.
					
					 A book-releasing ceremony took place in Sofia on Feb. 5.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un dirige campo de construccion de edificios para huerfanos  de Wonsan
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un dirige campo de construccion de edificios para huerfanos  de Wonsan
Pyongyang, 11 de febrero (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, dirigio en el terreno el campo de construccion del hospicio, el orfanato, la escuela primaria y la secundaria de la ciudad de Wonsan.
					Recorriendo el campo de construccion, el Mariscal hizo detallado conocimiento de la obra.
					
					Subrayo que si se construyen en un lugar las instalaciones para la crianza y la educacion de los huerfanos, ellos pueden cursar sin ninguna incomodidad desde la casa cuna hasta la escuela secundaria.
					
					Al decir que es la firme decision de nuestro partido formar a todos los huerfanos como fidedignos trabajadores del pais, dio instrucciones para acelerar la obra.
					
					Instruyo levantar una llamarada de gran innovacion y gran salto a traves de las intensas labores politicas en el terreno, entre otras, agitacion visual, propaganda radial y propaganda artistica y organizar activamente la emulacion socialista por unidades, etapas y objetos.
					
					Al senalar la necesidad de prestar profunda atencion a elevar la calidad de las obras arquitectonicas, ordeno fortalecer la supervision y el control para que los constructores observen estrictamente las demandas del diseno y los reglamentos de la obra.
					
					Dijo que se deben suministrar suficientes materiales de acero, cemento y otros materiales de construccion para terminar con antelacion la construccion y tomo las medidas necesarias.
					
					Enfatizo la necesidad de arreglar bien el medioambiente de hospicio, orfanato, la escuela primaria y la secundaria y de plantar muchos arboles para hacer frondosos los montes y llanuras de contorno.
					
					Hay que hacer paralelamente la construccion y los preparativos de gestion, acoto y continuo que se debe elaborar al maximo nivel tanto los muebles, utensilios y equipamiento escolar como los uniformes para las criadoras y educadoras y hacer bien al mismo tiempo la seleccion y preparacion de los empleados.
					
					Refirio que el partido envio a todas las provincias el diseno modelo de las instalaciones de crianza y educacion para los huerfanos y anadio que todas las regiones deben empenarse por levantarlas acorde a las caracteristicas locales, el medioambiente y la capacidad.
					
					Enfatizo que para materializar estrictamente la linea de construccion del partido, todas las provincias deben preparar bien las fuerzas del diseno y la obra y disponer de una firme base material y tecnica.
					
					Dijo que al recorrer el campo de construccion, pudo sentir otra vez que en todos los lugares   donde los militares del EPC dejan sus huellas, se realiza satisfactoriamente el proyecto del partido y subrayo que los combatientes de la unidad 863 de las fuerzas navales del EPC carentes de las experiencias de construccion, terminaron la obra de armazon de hospicio con la lucha abnegada bajo la consigna "Encarguemonos tanto de la defensa de la patria como de la construccion del socialismo", siendo pionero y modelo en la materializacion de ideologia del partido y la defensa de su politica.
					
					Me siento por no haberme encontrado con los combatientes de la unidad 863, que estan en el camino de ejercicios para materializar la nueva orden, dijo y encomendo entregarles el saludo combativo del Comandante Supremo que se mostro muy satisfecho dando vueltas por el campo de construccion. 
					
					Ordeno movilizar mas las fuerzas de construccion en el ejercito para terminar en el presente ano, en que se cumplira el 70o aniversario de la fundacion del PTC, la construccion de hospicio y orfanato hasta el Dia del Sol (15 de abril, dia de nacimiento del Presidente Kim Il Sung), y la de la escuela primaria y la secundaria, hasta el dia de victoria en la guerra (27 de julio) y subrayo que se deben construir en el maximo nivel todas las obras arquitectonicas para responsabilizarse con mil anos y garantizar diez mil anos, ofreciendo asi a los huerfanos excelentes nidos de vida.
					
					Expreso la esperanza y la conviccion de que uniendo las almas con los habitantes de la provincia de Kangwon, los constructores militares terminaran las obras apoyando con la practica la voluntad del CC del PTC de formar a los huerfanos como confiables sucesores de la revolucion.
					
					El Mariscal fue acompanado por Choe Ryong Hae, Hwang Pyong So, Hyon Yong Chol y Han Kwang Sang y Jo Yong Won.

articles.title: CRPP publica declaracion especial
articles.content:
CRPP publica declaracion especial 
Pyongyang, 11 de febrero (ACNC) -- El Comite por la Reunificacion Pacifica de la Patria hizo publica el dia 11 una declaracion especial aclarando la posicion de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea sobre la grave situacion creada por el anacronico servilismo proyanqui de las autoridades surcoreanas.
					La nota sigue:
					
					1. Si las autoridades surcoreanas se incorporan a la guerra de agresion de Estados Unidos que pretende perturbar la paz y la estabilidad de la Peninsula Coreana y exterminar a la RPDC, no podran eludir el fin mas tragico. 
					
					Hasta ahora, hemos presentado los proyectos mas racionales y realistas para la reunificacion pacifica y realizado constantes esfuerzos por ponerlos en practica, aunque conocemos otros medios y metodos de reunificacion y tenemos la fuerza y capacidad de lograrla. 
					
					No deseamos que la Peninsula Coreana sufra otra vez los desastres de guerra. 
					
					Hemos consolidado por todos los medios la capacidad militar superando las severas pruebas de la historia para prevenir la guerra de agresion de EE.UU. y defender el destino de la nacion. Y ahora contamos con los medios de ataque nuclear minimizados, precisos y diversificados con el fin de terminar en el territorio estadounidense la batalla decisiva contra EE.UU. 
					
					Pero, no ocultamos que el Sur de Corea tambien sera el blanco de nuestro ataque de venganza si los belicistas surcoreanos se ofrecen como carnes de canon de la guerra de agresion de EE.UU. 
					
					Tenemos la conviccion y la filosofia de victoria de que venceremos vivos en el combate contra los agresores y provocadores que moriran. 
					
					2. Si las autoridades surcoreanas siguen recurriendo a la "colaboracion" internacional encaminada a presionar y derrumbar a la RPDC, sufriran el arruinamiento mas vergonzoso. 
					
					 Todos los que abultan su expediente criminal actuando como brigada de choque de la campana de "colaboracion internacional" de EE.UU., sin tomar en cuenta la dignidad ni los intereses de la nacion, no podran eludir el destino tragico en la batalla intransigente sin precedentes, proclamada por la RPDC. 
					
					3. Si las autoridades surcoreanas intentan convertir los vinculos Norte-Sur en los sujetos a las relaciones con EE.UU. bajo el enganoso cartel de "dialogo", seran condenadas por toda la nacion como maniacos conflictivos de peor calana. 
					
					Hemos tomado la decision de resolver con magnanimidad las relaciones intercoreanas mediante el dialogo tratando a los gobernantes surcoreanos como contraparte, aunque ellos estan colmados de la conciencia servil a EE.UU. Es que asi quisimos darles la oportunidad de hacer favores para la nacion en el tiempo importante como este ano. 
					
					Las autoridades surcoreanas deben tener correcta actitud sobre la parte connacional y dirigirse a resolver radicalmente los vinculos Norte-Sur, en lugar de hablar del "cambio de actitud" de alguien. 
					
					Deben conocer que el servilismo proyanqui les traera el fin mas tragico. 
					
					Todos los integrantes de la nacion coreana en el Norte, el Sur y en ultramar deben frustrar las maniobras de EE.UU. destinadas a detener la corriente de reunificacion de Corea y  los actos traidores y vendepatrias de los titeres surcoreanos que obedecen a ciegas al imperio norteamericano.
					
					Han de levantarse como un solo hombre en la sagrada lucha patriotica por abrir la nueva era de paz, estabilidad, reunificacion independiente y prosperidad de la Peninsula Coreana.

articles.title: Premier coreano felicita a su par de Tunez
articles.content:
Premier coreano felicita a su par de Tunez
Pyongyang, 11 de febrero (ACNC) -- El premier coreano Pak Pong Ju envio la vispera un mensaje de felicitacion a Habib Essid, electo como primer ministro de la Republica Tunecina.
					En su misiva, el remitente deseo exitos en el trabajo del destinatario por lograr la estabilidad politica y la prosperidad economica del pais.
					
					Tambien el mismo dia, el canciller coreano Ri Su Yong lo envio al nuevo electo canciller tunecino Taied Baccouche.

articles.title: Divulgada en Bulgaria obra de Kim Jong Un
articles.content:
Divulgada en Bulgaria obra de Kim Jong Un
Pyongyang, 11 de febrero (ACNC) -- Una Editorial de Bulgaria dio a luz en folleto la obra del Mariscal Kim Jong Un "Aceleremos la construccion de una patria poderosa y prospera, materializando el patriotismo de Kim Jong Il".
					El trabajo, publicado el 26 de julio del 101 (2012) de la Era Juche, aclara la esencia de tal patriotismo y enumera la noble vida del Dirigente caracterizada por el amor a la patria y al pueblo.
					
					Tambien indica los asuntos importantes que se presentan para materializar el citado patriotismo.
					
					La ceremonia de publicacion tuvo lugar el dia 5 en Sofia.

articles.title: Secretario general de partido argelino apoya lucha de PTC
articles.content:
Secretario general de partido argelino apoya lucha de PTC
Pyongyang, 11 de febrero (ACNC) -- El embajador extraordinario y plenipotenciario de la RPDC en Argelia, Choe Hyok Chol, realizo el dia 2 una visita de cortesia al secretario general del Partido Frente de Liberacion Nacional de Argelia, Ammar Saadani. 
					En la ocasion el secretario general dijo que la Direccion y militantes del Partido Frente de Liberacion Nacional de Argelia, encantados por Su Excelencia Kim Jong Un, apoyan lo todo proyectado por ese gran hombre y continuo:
					
					Su Excelencia Kim Jong Un conduce al pueblo coreano tomando en una mano las fuerzas armadas y en la otra, la linea de construccion de un Estado prospero. 
					
					El tomo gran decision para prevenir la guerra en la Peninsula Coreana y lograr la reunificacion pacifica de Corea.
					
					El Partido Frente de Liberacion Nacional de Argelia enviara en adelante tambien el apoyo total y la solidaridad a la lucha del Partido del Trabajo de Corea por rechazar la intervencion de Estados Unidos, defender el socialismo y reunificar la patria. 
					
					Las relaciones entre los dos paises son las arraigadas e historicas de amistad y cooperacion preparadas por el Presidente Houari Boumedienne y el gran Lider del pueblo coreano Kim Il Sung.
					
					En el futuro haremos ingentes esfuerzos por consolidar mas los tradicionales e historicos lazos de amistad, cooperacion, solidaridad y unidad con el PTC.
